attributes.action: Punish the owners of dogs which foul public parks and footpaths if they will not clean up after their animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Preferably this punishment would take the form of immediate confiscation and destruction of the animal in question and a hefty fine. A DNA register of all dogs owned in this country would be able to identify which beast was responsible, and would also make dealing with violent animals easier.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
